Description: Copper alloy lamp handle: with a scallop-shell-shaped reflector ornament which covers most of the upper surface of the lamp. Surface colouration: cleaned to bare metal.
Curator's comments: Attached to 1919,0505.774. The body of 1919,0505.774 and this handle-ornament belong together and are of the same metal mix. Analyses: copper: 69.8; lead: 12.7; tin: 2.9; zinc: 13.6.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (3821)
